A Scenic
Residence
on The Park
Sitting at the southeast corner of Ann & Park, just
steps from the lake and the vibrant energy
of the village main street, The Ann is a fresh new
presence in Port Credit
Neighborhood
With a mix of convenient shopping staples and local independent retailers, everything from fashion to specialty stores, florists to farmers markets, Port Credit has everything you need all close to home.
Explore the Neighborhood
Outdoors
Nearly three dozen parks are scattered throughout  Port Credit with most of them set on the water providing the perfect setting for an active lifestyle. At Jack Darling Park, the bights green space in Port Credit, discover sandy beaches, tennis courts, a large off leash dog park, and connections to the renowned  Waterfront Trail.
Explore the Outdoors

NATIONAL
HISTORICAL SITE

CONSERVATION AREAS
Amenities
Within curving lines, sculptural design, and direct slightness to the outdoors from almost every space, the amenities at The Ann are yet another element that pay homage to the natural landscape.
Explore the Amenities
Interiors
Inspired by the soothing colours and textures of the surrounding environment of the and the lake views, as well as the historical roots of the town, the interiors at The Ann honour the natural landscape of Port Credit, while forging ahead with a more refined aesthetic for today’s modern lifestyle.
Explore the Interiors
For A Scenic
